properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I see the works of Your Hands Galaxies spin in a Heavenly dance oh God All that You are is so overwhelming I hear the sound of Your Voice All at once it’s a gentle and thundering noise oh God All that You are is so overwhelming{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I delight myself in You Captivated by Your beauty I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You God, I run into Your arms Unashamed because of mercy I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I delight myself in You In the Glory of Your Presence I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You God, I run into Your arms Unashamed because of mercy I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I delight myself in You In the Glory of Your Presence I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You God, I run into Your arms Unashamed because of mercy I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You.{/lang-eng}
